price: 圣洁哉安拉！如果他意欲，他要赏赐你比那个更好的，即下临诸河的果园，他要赏赐你一些大厦。
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيۡرٗا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكَ قُصُورَۢا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī in shāa jaʿala laka khayran min dhālika jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru wayajʿal laka quṣūran
